<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#232323;mso-font-kerning:0pt">当程序运行的过程中异常终止或崩溃，操作系统会将程序当时的内存状态记录下来，保存在一个文件中，这种行为就叫做<span lang="EN-US">Core Dump</span>（中文有的翻译成“核心转储”<span lang="EN-US">)</span>。我们可以认为<span lang="EN-US"> core dump </span>是“内存快照”，但实际上，除了内存信息之外，还有些关键的程序运行状态也会同时<span lang="EN-US"> dump </span>下来，例如寄存器信息（包括程序指针、栈指针等）、内存管理信息、其他处理器和操作系统状态和信息。<span lang="EN-US">core dump </span>对于编程人员诊断和调试程序是非常有帮助的，因为对于有些程序错误是很难重现的，例如指针异常，而<span lang="EN-US"> core dump </span>文件可以再现程序出错时的情景。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:24.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#232323;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">Core Dump </span><span style="font-size:24.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#232323;mso-font-kerning:0pt">名词解释<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:
minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#232323;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在半导体作为电脑内存材料之前，电脑内存使用的是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:微软雅黑;mso-fareast-font-family:
微软雅黑;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#232323;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span lang="EN-US"><a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Core_memory"><span lang="ZH-CN" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#1186C0;
mso-font-kerning:0pt;text-decoration:none;text-underline:none">磁芯内存</span></a></span><span style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#232323;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">（<span lang="EN-US">Magnetic Core Memory</span>），<span lang="EN-US">Core Dump </span>中的<span lang="EN-US"> Core </span>沿用了磁芯内存的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;mso-ascii-font-family:微软雅黑;mso-fareast-font-family:
微软雅黑;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#232323;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:
Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#232323;

mso-ascii-font-family:微软雅黑;mso-fareast-font-family:微软雅黑;mso-bidi-font-family:
微软雅黑;color:#232323;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:

微软雅黑;mso-bidi-font-family:微软雅黑;color:#4C4C4C;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:

<p class="MsoNormal"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:15.0pt;font-family:

mso-font-kerning:0pt">指的是拷贝一种存储介质中的部分内容到另一个存储介质，或者将内容打印、显示或者其它输出设备。<span lang="EN-US">dump </span>出来的内容是格式化的，可以使用一些工具来解析它。<span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:15.0pt;
